description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a flyback converter for Mars helicopter drone. Input: 28V from lander umbilical during charge, Output: 6×3.7V Li-ion cells at 2A charge. Must operate in 0.6% Earth atmospheric pressure, survive -90°C nights, and provide autonomous charging during sol.

Design a full-bridge converter for electromagnetic railgun capacitor charging. Input: 13.8kV 3-phase (rectified ~18kV DC), Output: 5kV at 500A average to charge 100MJ capacitor bank. Must charge in 60 seconds, handle regenerative energy from misfires, and meet MIL-STD-1399.

Design a boost converter for re-entry vehicle electronics during blackout phase. Input: 28V from thermal battery, Output: 150V at 10A for phased array antenna. Must operate through 3000°C plasma sheath, survive 15g deceleration, and maintain comms during blackout.

Design a Ćuk converter for advanced LIGO seismometer array. Input: 24V from isolation transformer, Output: -15V at 500mA for geophone preamps. Must achieve <10⁻¹²g/√Hz noise floor, operate in ultra-high vacuum (10⁻⁹ torr), and provide isolation from ground loops.

Design a forward converter for orbital propellant depot cryocooler. Input: 120V DC from solar array, Output: 28V at 30A for Stirling cryocooler. Must maintain liquid hydrogen at 20K, operate for 15-year mission, and survive micrometeorite impacts.

Design a SEPIC converter for borehole tiltmeter at volcano summit. Input: 12V-18V from solar/battery, Output: 5V at 500mA for precision tilt sensor. Must achieve <1 nanoradian resolution, survive volcanic gases (SO2, H2S), and provide 5-year autonomous operation.

Design a half-bridge converter for particle accelerator klystron modulator. Input: 34.5kV AC (rectified ~47kV), Output: 350kV at 500A pulse for klystron. Must achieve <0.1% flat-top droop, 3ms pulse width, and 120Hz repetition rate.

Design a buck converter for semiconductor lithography stage motion control. Input: 48V from tool power, Output: 5V at 100A for linear motor drivers. Must achieve <1nm positioning contribution, <1ppm EMI at wafer, and operate in Class 1 cleanroom.

Design a flyback converter for deep ocean mooring instrumentation. Input: 12V from primary lithium pack, Output: 5V at 2A average for sensors and acoustic modem. Must operate at 6000m depth for 5 years, handle pressure cycling (recovery/redeployment), and communicate acoustically.

Design a full-bridge converter for tokamak neutral beam injector. Input: 10kV from grid rectifier, Output: 80kV at 60A for ion accelerator. Must achieve 5-second pulse duration, recover between plasma shots, and handle beam dump scenarios.
